Liberian Letters: Adeline Southall to Dr. James H. Minor 1860 January 19
Liberian Letters: Adeline Southall to Dr. James H. Minor 1860 January 19
Original manuscript located: UVa Library, call number MSS 10460 and MSS 10460-a
A letter from Margaret Coleman to James Minor, dated January 19, 1860, was written on the other side of this letter in the same handwriting but in different ink.
Original manuscript located: UVa Library, call number MSS 10460 and MSS 10460-a
A letter from Margaret Coleman to James Minor, dated January 19, 1860, was written on the other side of this letter in the same handwriting but in different ink.
Letters from former slaves of Terrell settled in Liberia, 1857-1866
Letters from former slaves of Terrell settled in Liberia, 1857-1866
Letters from former slaves of Terrell settled in Liberia, 1857-1866
January 19, 1860 from Adeline Southall 1 to Dr. James H. Minor

I recive one pare of shoese my Best respects to you & family please if you send me any more shuese send no 7 & on 8. Please send 1 pice of calco, 1 Box of Soap 2 piece of bleach cotton. Lucy send her love to all the family She says she recive 1 pare of shoese please send her pare of fine shoese no 7 one piece of Calco 1 bolt of bleach. 1 bolt of onbleach. 1 box fo of Tobacco. Box of Soap Nothing more
Adeline Southall to Dr. James H. Minor 1860 January 19
Adeline Southall to Dr. James H. Minor 1860 January 19
